title: No Charges Filed in October Shooting in Downtown Reno
content:
The Reno Police Department has announced that no charges are expected to be filed in a triple shooting that occurred in downtown Reno last month.
According to a press release, the incident happened at around 1 a.m. on October 23 in Douglas Alley near Siri's Casino. Three people were injured, including a 17-year-old female who succumbed to her injuries.
The investigation revealed that the 17-year-old female confronted a group of people, produced a firearm and fired several times. One subject from the victim group returned fire in defense, striking the female and resulting in her death.
